## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-840">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-840">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-841">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-842">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-842">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-843">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-843">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-844">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-844">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-845">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-845">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-846">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-846">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-847">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-847">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-848">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-848">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-849">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-849">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-850">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-850">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-851">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-851">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-852">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-852">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-853">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-853">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-854">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-855">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-855">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-856">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-857">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-858">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-858">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-859">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-859">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-860">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-860">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-861">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-861">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-862">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-862">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-863">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-863">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-865">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-865">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-866">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-866">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-867">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-867">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-868">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-868">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-869">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-869">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-870">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-870">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-871">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-871">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-872">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-872">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-873">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-873">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-874">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-874">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-875">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-876">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-876">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-877">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-877">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-878">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-878">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-879">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-879">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-880">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-880">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-881">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-881">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-882">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-882">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-883">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-883">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-884">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-884">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-885">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-886">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-888">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-889">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-890">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-890">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-891">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-892">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-892">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-893">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-893">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-894">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-894">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-895">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-895">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-896">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-897">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-897">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-898">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-899">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-899">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-900">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-900">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-901">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-901">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-902">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-902">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-903">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-903">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-904">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-904">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-905">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-905">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-906">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-907">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-907">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-908">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-908">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-909">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-910">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-910">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-913">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-913">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-914">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-914">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-920">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-920">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-921">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-921">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-922">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-922">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-929">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-929">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-930">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-931">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-931">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-932">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-932">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-933">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-933">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-934">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-934">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-935">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-935">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-936">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-936">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-937">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-937">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-938">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-938">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-939">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-939">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-940">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-940">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-941">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-941">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-942">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-943">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-948">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-949">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-949">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-950">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-950">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-968">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-968">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-969">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-970">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-970">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-971">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-971">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-972">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-972">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-973">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-973">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-974">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-974">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-975">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-976">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-977">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-978">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-978">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-979">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-979">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-980">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-980">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-981">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-981">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-983">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-983">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-985">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-985">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-987">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-990">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-990">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-991">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-991">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1013">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1013">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1014">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1015">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1015">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1016">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1017">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1017">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1018">6 자리 숫자와 2 개의 선택적 마침표 (YY) 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1018">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1019">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1019">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1020">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1020">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1021">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1021">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1022">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1022">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1023">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1024">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1025">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1027">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1027">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1028">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1028">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1029">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1030">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1030">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1031">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1031">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1032">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1032">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1091">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1091">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1092">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1092">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1093">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1094">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1094">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1095">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1096">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1096">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1097">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1098">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1098">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1099">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1100">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1101">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1101">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1102">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1102">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1126">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1126">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1127">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1128">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1129">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1129">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1130">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1131">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1131">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1132">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1133">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1133">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1134">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1135">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1136">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1136">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1137">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1137">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1138">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1139">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1139">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1159">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1159">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1160">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1161">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1162">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1163">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1164">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1166">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1167">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1167">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1169">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1169">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1170">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1170">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1171">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1171">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1172">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1172">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1173">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1173">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1174">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1174">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1175">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1175">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1176">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1176">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1177">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1177">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1178">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1179">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1179">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1180">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1181">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1182">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1182">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1183">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1183">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1185">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1185">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1197">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1197">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1198">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1199">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1199">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1200">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1201">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1201">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1202">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1202">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1203">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1203">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1204">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1204">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1205">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1205">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1206">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1206">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1207">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1207">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1208">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1208">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1209">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1209">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1210">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1210">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1211">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1214">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1215">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1215">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1216">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1219">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1219">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1232">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1232">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1234">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1234">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1236">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1236">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1237">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1238">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1238">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1239">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1240">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1240">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1241">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1241">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1242">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1242">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1243">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1243">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1244">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1244">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1245">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1245">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1247">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1250">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1250">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1251">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1251">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1252">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1254">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1254">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1255">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1277">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1277">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1278">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1279">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1279">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1282">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1282">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1283">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1283">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1284">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1284">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1285">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1285">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1286">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1286">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1287">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1287">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1288">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1288">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1289">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1289">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1291">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1291">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1292">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1292">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1293">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1293">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1294">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1295">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1296">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1297">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1298">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1298">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1299">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1299">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1300">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1300">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1301">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1302">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1302">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1303">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1305">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1305">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1314">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1314">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1315">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1316">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1317">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1317">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1318">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1319">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1319">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1320">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1321">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1321">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1322">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1324">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1324">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1325">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1325">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1344">불가리아 uniform 민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1344">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1345">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1345">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1346">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1346">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1347">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1347">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1348">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1348">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1349">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1349">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1351">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1352">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1352">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1353">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1354">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1354">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1355">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1355">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1356">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1356">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1357">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1357">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1358">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1358">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1360">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1363">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1363">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1364">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1364">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1366">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1366">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1411">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1411">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1412">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1413">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1414">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1416">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1417">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1418">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1421">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1421">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1422">From  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1422">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1428">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1428">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1436">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1436">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1437">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1437">номер на паспорт</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1439">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1439">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1441">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1441">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1443">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1443">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1444">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1444">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1445">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1445">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1446">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1446">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1447">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1447">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1448">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1448">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1449">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1449">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1451">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1453">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1454">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1454">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1455">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1455">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1456">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1456">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1458">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1458">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1459">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1459">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1483">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1483">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1485">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1485">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1487">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1487">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1488">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1489">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1490">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1491">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1492">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1492">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1493">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1493">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1494">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1494">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>

        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1630">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1630">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1631">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1632">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1632">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1633">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1633">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1634">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1634">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1635">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1636">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1636">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1637">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1638">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1639">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1639">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1640">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1640">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1643">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1643">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1645">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1645">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1646">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1646">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1647">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1647">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1648">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1648">patient hospital</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1652">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1652">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1653">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1654">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1654">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1655">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1656">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1656">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1657">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1658">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1659">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1660">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1661">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1661">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1662">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1662">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
