## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1692">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1692">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1693">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1694">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1694">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1695">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1696">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1697">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1698">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1699">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1700">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1701">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1701">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1702">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1702">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1735">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1735">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1736">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1737">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1737">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1739">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1739">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1740">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1740">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1741">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1741">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1742">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1743">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1743">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1744">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1744">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1745">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1745">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1746">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1747">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1747">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1748">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1749">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1750">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1750">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1751">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1751">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1752">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1752">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1753">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1753">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1754">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1754">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1755">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1755">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1757">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1757">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1758">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1758">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1759">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1784">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1784">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1785">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1786">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1786">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1787">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1788">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1788">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1789">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1789">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1790">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1790">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1791">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1791">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1792">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1792">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1793">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1793">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1794">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1794">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1795">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1795">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1796">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1797">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1797">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1798">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1799">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1800">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1800">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1801">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1801">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1802">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1802">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1804">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1804">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1805">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1820">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1820">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1821">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1822">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1822">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1823">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1824">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1824">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1825">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1825">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1826">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1826">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1827">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1827">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1828">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1828">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1829">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1830">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1831">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1832">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1833">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1833">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1834">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1834">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1835">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1836">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1837">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1837">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1838">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1851">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1851">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1852">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1853">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1853">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1855">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1855">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1856">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1857">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1857">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-1858">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1859">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1860">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1860">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1861">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1861">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1862">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1862">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1863">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1863">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1864">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1864">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1865">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1865">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-1866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1867">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1867">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-1868">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-1868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2128">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2128">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2129">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2130">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2131">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2131">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2132">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2133">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2133">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2134">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2135">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2135">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2136">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2138">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2138">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2139">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2139">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2155">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2155">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2156">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2156">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2157">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2158">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2158">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2159">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2160">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2160">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2161">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2162">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2163">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2164">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2165">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2165">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2166">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2166">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2197">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2197">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2198">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2198">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2199">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2199">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2200">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2200">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2201">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2202">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2202">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2203">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2204">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2204">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2205">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2206">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2207">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2207">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2208">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2226">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2226">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2227">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2228">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2228">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2230">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2230">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2231">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2232">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2232">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2233">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2234">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2236">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2237">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2237">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2238">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2238">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2239">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2239">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2241">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2241">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2242">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2273">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2273">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2274">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2274">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2275">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2276">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2276">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2277">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2278">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2278">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2279">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2279">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2280">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2280">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2281">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2282">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2282">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2284">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2284">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2285">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2285">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2286">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2286">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2287">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2288">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2288">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2301">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2301">personal id number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2305">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2305">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2306">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2306">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2307">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2308">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2308">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2309">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2310">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2310">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2311">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2312">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2312">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2313">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2314">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2314">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2315">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2315">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2316">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2316">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2331">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2331">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2332">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2333">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2334">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2335">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2336">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2337">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2338">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2339">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2339">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2340">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2341">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2341">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2342">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2343">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2343">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2344">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2345">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2346">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2346">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2347">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2347">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2348">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2348">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2349">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2349">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2350">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2350">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2351">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2351">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2352">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2352">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2353">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2353">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2354">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2354">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2355">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2355">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2356">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2356">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2357">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2357">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2358">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2359">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2359">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2360">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2361">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2361">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2363">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2366">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2367">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2393">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2393">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2394">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2394">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2395">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2395">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2396">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2396">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2397">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2397">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2398">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2398">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2400">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2401">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2401">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2402">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2403">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2403">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2404">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2404">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2405">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2405">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2406">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2406">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2407">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2408">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2408">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2409">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2410">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2411">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2411">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2412">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2412">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2414">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2414">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2442">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2442">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2443">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2444">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2445">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2445">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2447">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2447">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2448">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2449">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2449">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2450">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2450">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2451">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2452">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2455">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2455">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2456">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2456">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2457">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2457">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2462">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2462">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2463">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2463">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2465">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2465">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2466">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2466">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2467">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2467">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2468">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2468">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2469">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2469">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2470">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2470">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2473">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2473">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2474">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2474">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2475">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2476">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2476">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2478">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2478">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2479">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2480">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2482">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2483">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2483">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2484">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2503">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2503">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2504">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2505">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2505">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2506">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2507">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2507">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2508">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2508">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2509">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2509">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2510">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2510">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2511">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2511">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2512">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2512">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2513">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2513">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2514">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2514">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2515">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2516">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2517">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2519">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2519">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2520">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2520">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2521">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2523">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2523">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2524">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2571">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2571">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2572">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2572">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2573">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2574">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2574">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2575">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2576">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2576">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2577">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2577">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2578">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2578">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2579">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2579">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2580">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2580">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2582">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2582">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2585">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2585">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2586">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2586">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2588">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2588">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2604">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2604">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2605">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2606">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2607">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2607">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2608">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2609">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2609">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2610">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2611">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2611">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2612">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2613">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2614">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2614">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2615">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2615">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2632">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2632">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2633">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2634">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2635">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2635">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2636">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2637">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2637">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2638">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2639">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2639">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2640">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2641">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2641">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2642">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2642">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2643">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2643">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2660">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2660">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2662">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2662">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2664">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2664">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2665">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2665">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2666">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2666">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2667">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2667">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2668">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2669">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2672">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2672">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2673">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2673">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2674">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2674">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2675">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2675">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2676">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2676">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2677">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2749">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2749">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2750">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2751">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2752">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2752">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2754">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2754">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2755">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2755">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2756">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2756">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2757">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2757">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2759">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2762">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2762">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2763">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2763">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2765">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2765">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
