## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2779">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2779">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2781">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2781">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2783">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2783">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2784">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2784">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2785">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2785">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2786">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2786">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2787">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2788">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2791">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2791">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2793">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2793">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2794">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2794">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2795">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2795">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2796">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2796">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2797">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2798">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2798">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2799">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2800">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2800">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2801">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2801">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2802">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2802">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2803">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2804">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2806">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2807">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2808">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2814">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2814">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2815">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2815">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2824">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2824">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2825">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2826">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2827">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2828">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2829">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2831">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2832">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2832">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2834">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2834">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2835">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2835">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2836">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2836">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2837">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2837">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2838">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2838">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2839">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2840">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2840">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2842">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2842">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2843">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2843">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2844">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2844">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2846">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2846">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2879">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2879">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2880">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2881">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2882">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2882">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2884">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2884">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2885">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2886">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2889">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2889">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2890">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2890">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2905">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2905">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2906">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2907">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2907">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2908">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2909">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2909">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2910">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2911">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-2912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-2913">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2914">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2914">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2915">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2915">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2916">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2916">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2917">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2917">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2918">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2918">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2919">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2919">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2920">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2920">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-2921">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-2921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3367">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3367">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3368">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3368">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3369">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3370">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3370">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3371">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3372">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3372">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3373">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3373">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3374">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3374">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3375">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3375">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3376">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3377">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3377">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3378">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3379">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3380">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3380">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3381">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3381">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3397">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3397">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3398">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3398">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3399">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3399">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3400">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3400">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3401">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3401">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3402">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3402">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3404">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3405">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3405">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3407">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3407">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3408">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3408">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3409">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3409">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3410">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3410">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3411">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3412">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3412">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3413">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3414">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3414">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3415">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3415">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3416">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3416">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3434">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3434">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3435">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3436">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3436">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3437">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3438">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3438">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3439">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3439">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3440">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3440">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3441">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3441">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3442">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3442">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3443">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3444">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3447">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3447">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3448">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3448">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3449">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3449">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3451">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3451">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3452">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3452">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3501">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3501">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3502">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3502">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3503">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3503">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3504">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3504">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3505">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3505">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3506">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3506">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3507">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3507">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3508">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3508">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3509">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3510">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3511">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3512">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3513">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3513">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3514">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 또는 Keyword_finland_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3514">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3515">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3515">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3519">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3519">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3520">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3520">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3521">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3521">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3524">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3524">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3525">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3525">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3526">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3526">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3527">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3527">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3528">suomalainen (si)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3528">suomalainen passi</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3530">passin numero. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3530">passin numero.#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3535">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3535">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3536">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3537">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3538">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3538">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3539">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3540">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3540">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3541">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3541">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3542">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3542">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3543">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3543">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3544">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3544">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3545">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3545">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3546">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3546">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3547">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3547">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3548">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3549">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3549">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3550">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3551">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3552">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3552">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3553">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3553">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3555">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3555">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3556">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3556">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3557">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3557">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3564">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3564">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3565">국가 id 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3565">national id no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3566">국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3566">national id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3567">id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3567">id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3568">tunnistenumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3568">tunnistenumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3569">henkilötunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3569">henkilötunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3570">yksilöllinen henkilökohtainen tunnistenumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3570">yksilöllinen henkilökohtainen tunnistenumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3571">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3571">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3572">identiteetti numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3572">identiteetti numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3573">suomen kansallinen henkilötunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3573">suomen kansallinen henkilötunnus</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3579">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3579">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3580">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3580">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3581">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3582">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3583">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3584">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3584">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3585">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3586">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3587">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3589">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3589">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3590">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3590">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3591">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3591">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3592">Func_eu_date 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3592">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3604">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3604">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3605">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3605">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3606">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3606">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3607">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3607">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3608">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3608">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3609">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3609">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3610">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3610">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3611">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3612">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3612">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3613">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3614">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3614">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3615">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3615">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3616">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3616">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3617">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3617">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3618">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3618">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3619">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3619">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3620">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3621">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3623">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3624">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3624">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3625">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3625">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3626">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3626">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3627">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3627">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3628">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3628">insurance card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3630">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3630">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3631">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3631">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3632">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3633">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3633">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3634">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3635">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3635">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3636">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3637">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3637">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3638">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3639">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3639">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3640">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3640">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3641">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3641">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3655">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3655">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3656">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3656">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3657">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3658">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3658">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3659">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3660">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3660">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3661">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3661">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3662">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3662">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3663">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3663">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3664">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3664">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3665">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3665">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3666">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3666">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3667">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3667">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3668">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3668">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3669">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3669">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3690">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3690">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3691">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3692">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3693">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3693">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3694">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3695">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3695">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3696">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3696">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3697">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3697">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3698">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3698">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3699">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3700">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3700">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3701">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3702">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3702">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3703">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3703">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3704">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3704">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3705">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3706">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3707">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3707">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3708">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3708">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3709">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3735">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3735">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3736">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3737">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3737">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3739">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3739">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3740">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3740">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3741">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3741">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3742">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3742">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3743">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3743">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3744">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3744">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3745">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3745">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3746">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3746">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3747">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3747">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3748">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3748">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3749">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3749">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3750">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3751">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3754">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3755">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3757">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3757">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3761">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3764">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3764">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3767">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3767">tax registration number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3776">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3776">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3777">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3777">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3778">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3778">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3779">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3779">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3780">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3780">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3781">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3781">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3782">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3782">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3783">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3783">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3784">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3785">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3785">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3786">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3787">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3787">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3788">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3788">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3789">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3789">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3790">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3790">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3791">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3791">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3792">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3792">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3793">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3793">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3794">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3794">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3795">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3795">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3796">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3796">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3797">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3798">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3801">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3802">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3802">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3804">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3804">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3817">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3817">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3818">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3818">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3819">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3820">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3822">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3823">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3824">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3825">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3826">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3827">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3832">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3833">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3833">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3834">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3834">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3835">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3835">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3836">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3836">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3837">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3837">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
