## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3930">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3930">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3931">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3932">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3932">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3933">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3933">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3934">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3935">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3935">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3936">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3936">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3937">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3937">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3938">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3938">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3939">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3939">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3941">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3943">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3944">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3944">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3945">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3945">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3947">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3947">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3948">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3948">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3949">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3949">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3950">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3950">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3951">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3951">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3952">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3952">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3953">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3953">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3954">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3954">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3955">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3955">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3956">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3956">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3957">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3957">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3958">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3958">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3959">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3959">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3960">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3960">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3961">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3961">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3962">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3962">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3963">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3964">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3964">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3965">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3966">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3967">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3967">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3968">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3968">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3969">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3969">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3970">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3970">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3971">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3972">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3972">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3973">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3974">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3975">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3975">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3976">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3976">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3977">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3978">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3979">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3979">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3980">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3980">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3981">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3981">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3982">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3982">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3983">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3983">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3984">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3984">reisepasse</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3986">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3986">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3987">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3987">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3988">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3988">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3990">reisepässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3990">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3991">포트 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3991">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3992">포트 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3992">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3993">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3993">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3994">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3995">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3995">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-3996">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-3997">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3997">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3998">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3998">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-3999">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-3999">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4000">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4000">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4001">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4001">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4002">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4002">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4003">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4003">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4004">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4004">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4005">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4005">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4006">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4007">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4009">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4010">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4010">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4011">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4011">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4012">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4013">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4013">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4039">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4039">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4040">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4040">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4041">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4041">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4042">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4042">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4043">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4043">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4044">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4044">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4046">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4047">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4047">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4048">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4049">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4049">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4050">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4050">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4051">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4051">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4052">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4052">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4053">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4053">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4054">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4054">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4055">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4055">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4056">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4056">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4057">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4057">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4058">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4059">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4059">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4060">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4062">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4062">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4063">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4063">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4064">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4065">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4065">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4068">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4068">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4070">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4070">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4071">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4071">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4075">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4075">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4076">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4076">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4077">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4078">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4078">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4080">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4080">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4081">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4082">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4083">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4085">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4085">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4086">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4086">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4103">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4103">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4104">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4105">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4105">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4106">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4107">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4107">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4108">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4108">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4109">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4109">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4110">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4110">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4111">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4111">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4112">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4112">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4113">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4113">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4114">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4114">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4115">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4119">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4119">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4120">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4120">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4121">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4121">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4122">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4122">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4133">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4133">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4134">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4134">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4135">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4136">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4136">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4137">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4138">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4138">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4139">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4140">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4141">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4143">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4144">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4149">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4149">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4150">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4150">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4154">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4154">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4156">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4156">passport numbers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4158">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4158">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4159">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4159">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4160">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4160">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4161">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4161">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4162">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4162">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4163">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4163">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4164">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4164">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4165">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4165">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4166">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4166">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4168">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4169">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4169">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4171">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4171">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4173">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4173">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4176">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4176">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4177">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4177">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4206">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4206">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4207">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4208">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4208">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4209">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4210">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4210">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4211">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4211">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4212">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4212">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4213">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4213">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4218">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4218">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4219">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4219">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4222">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4222">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4223">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4263">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4263">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4264">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4266">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4266">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4268">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4268">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4269">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4269">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4270">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4270">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4271">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4272">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4272">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4273">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4274">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4274">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4275">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4275">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4276">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4276">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4278">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4278">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4282">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4282">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4283">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4283">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4284">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4284">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4286">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4286">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4288">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4288">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4289">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4289">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4290">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4290">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4291">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4291">vezetoi engedely</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4292">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4292">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4293">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4293">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4294">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4294">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4295">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4295">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4296">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4296">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4297">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4297">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4299">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4300">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4300">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4301">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4302">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4302">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4303">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4303">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4304">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4304">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4305">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4305">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4306">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4306">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4307">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4308">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4308">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4309">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4310">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4311">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4311">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4312">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4312">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4313">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4314">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4314">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4325">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4325">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4326">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4328">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4328">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4330">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4330">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4331">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4332">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4333">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4334">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4335">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4335">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4336">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4353">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4353">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4354">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4356">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4356">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4358">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4358">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4360">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4363">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4363">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4364">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4364">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4366">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4366">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4386">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4386">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4387">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4388">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4389">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4390">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4391">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4393">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4394">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4394">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4395">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4396">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4396">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4397">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4397">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4398">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4398">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4399">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4399">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4400">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4401">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4402">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4403">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4404">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4404">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4405">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4405">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4406">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4407">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4407">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4408">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4408">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4409">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4409">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4433">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4433">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4434">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4435">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4436">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4437">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4438">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4441">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4441">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4443">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4443">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4444">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4444">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4445">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4445">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4446">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4446">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4447">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4448">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4450">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4451">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4451">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4452">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4452">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4454">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4454">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4456">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4456">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4463">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4463">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4464">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4464">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4465">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4465">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4468">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4468">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4469">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4470">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4470">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4472">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4472">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4473">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4473">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4474">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4474">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4475">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4475">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4476">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4477">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4477">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4478">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4479">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4479">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4480">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4480">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4481">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4481">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4482">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4482">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4483">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4483">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4485">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4485">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4486">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4486">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4487">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4487">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4488">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4489">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4489">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4490">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4491">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4491">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4492">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4492">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4493">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4493">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4494">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4494">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4495">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4495">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4496">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4496">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4497">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4498">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4499">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4500">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4500">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4501">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4501">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4502">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4502">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4503">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4503">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4504">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4505">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4505">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4506">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
