## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4513">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4513">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4514">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4515">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4515">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4517">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4517">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4518">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4518">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4519">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4519">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4520">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4520">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4521">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4521">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4522">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4522">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4523">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4523">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4524">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4524">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4525">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4525">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4526">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4527">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4527">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4528">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4529">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4530">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4530">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4531">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4531">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4532">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4532">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4534">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4534">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4537">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4537">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4539">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4539">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4541">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4541">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4542">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4542">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4543">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4543">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4544">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4544">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4545">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4545">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4546">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4546">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4547">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4547">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, ,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4549">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4550">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4551">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4552">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4553">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4553">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4554">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4555">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4555">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4556">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4556">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4557">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4557">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4558">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4559">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4559">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4560">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4561">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4561">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4562">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4562">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4563">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4563">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4564">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4564">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4565">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4565">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4566">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4566">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4567">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4567">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4569">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4569">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4570">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4570">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4571">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4571">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4572">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4572">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4573">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4573">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4574">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4574">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4583">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4585">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4585">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4586">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4587">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4587">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4589">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4589">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4590">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4590">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4591">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4591">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4592">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4592">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4593">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4593">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4594">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4594">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4595">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4595">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4596">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4596">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4597">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4597">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4598">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4598">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4599">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4600">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4601">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4601">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4602">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4603">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4603">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4604">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4604">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4605">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4605">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4606">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4606">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4607">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4607">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4608">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4608">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4609">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4609">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4610">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4610">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4611">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4611">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4612">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4612">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4613">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4613">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4614">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4614">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4615">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4615">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4616">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4616">ip addresses</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4619">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4619">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4620">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4620">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4621">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4622">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4622">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4623">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4624">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4624">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4625">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4625">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4626">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4626">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4627">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4628">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4629">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4630">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4631">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4631">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4632">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4632">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4638">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4638">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4642">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4642">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4643">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4643">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4644">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4644">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4645">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4645">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4648">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4648">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4649">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4649">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4650">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4651">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4651">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4653">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4653">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4654">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4654">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4655">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4655">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4656">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4657">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4658">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4659">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4660">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4660">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4661">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4662">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4662">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4674">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4674">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4675">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4675">passeport numero</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4680">uimhir cárta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4680">uimhir cárta</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4682">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4682">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4684">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4684">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4685">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4685">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4686">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4686">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4687">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4687">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4688">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4689">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4689">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4690">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4691">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4691">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4692">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4692">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4693">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4693">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4694">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4694">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4695">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4695">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4697">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4700">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4700">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4701">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4701">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4702">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4703">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4704">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4704">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4705">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4750">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4750">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4751">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4752">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4752">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4754">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4754">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4755">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4755">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4756">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4756">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4757">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4757">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4758">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4758">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4759">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4759">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4760">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4760">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4761">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4761">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4762">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4763">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4766">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4766">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4767">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4767">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4768">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4770">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4770">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4771">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4771">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4772">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4772">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4774">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4774">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4775">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4776">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4776">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4777">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4778">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4778">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4779">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4780">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4781">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4782">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4783">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4783">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4784">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4784">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4785">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4786">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4786">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4788">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4788">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4789">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4789">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4790">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4790">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4791">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4792">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4793">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4793">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4794">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4795">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4795">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4796">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4796">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4797">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4797">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4798">7 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4798">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4799">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4799">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4800">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4801">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4801">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4804">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4804">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4805">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4805">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4806">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4806">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4808">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4808">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4809">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4809">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4810">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4810">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4811">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4811">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4812">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4812">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4813">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4813">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4814">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4814">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4815">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4815">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4817">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4818">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4818">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4819">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4820">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4820">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4821">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4821">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4822">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4822">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4823">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4823">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4824">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4824">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4825">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4825">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4826">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4826">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4827">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4827">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4832">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4832">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4833">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4835">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4835">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4870">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4870">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4871">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4872">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4873">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4873">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4874">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4875">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4875">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4876">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4876">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4877">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4877">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4878">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4879">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4879">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4880">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4881">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4882">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4882">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4883">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4884">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4884">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4885">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4885">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4904">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4904">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4905">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4905">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4906">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4906">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4907">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4907">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4908">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4908">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4909">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4909">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4911">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4912">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4912">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4913">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4914">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4914">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4915">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4915">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4916">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4916">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4917">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4917">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4918">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4918">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4919">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4920">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4920">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4921">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4922">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4922">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4923">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4923">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4924">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4924">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4925">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4926">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4926">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4934">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4934">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4935">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4936">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4936">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4937">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4938">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4938">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4939">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4939">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4940">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4940">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4941">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4941">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4942">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4942">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4943">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4943">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-4946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4948">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4948">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4949">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4949">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4950">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4950">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4951">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4951">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4952">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4952">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-4953">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4954">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4954">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-4955">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-4955">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5014">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5014">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5015">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5016">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5016">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5018">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5018">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5019">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5020">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5022">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5023">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5023">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5024">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5024">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5052">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5052">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5053">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5054">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5055">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5056">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5057">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5058">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5059">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5060">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5060">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5061">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5062">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5062">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5063">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5063">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5064">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5064">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5065">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5066">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5066">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5067">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5068">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5069">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5069">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5070">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5070">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5072">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5072">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5087">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5087">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5088">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5088">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5100">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5100">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5103">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5104">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5104">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5105">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5105">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5106">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5106">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5107">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5108">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5108">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5113">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5113">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5114">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5114">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5115">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5115">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
