## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5121">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5121">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5122">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5123">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5123">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5124">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5125">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5125">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5126">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5127">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5128">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5129">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5130">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5130">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5131">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5131">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5132">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5132">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5134">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5134">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5135">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5135">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5136">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5136">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5137">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5137">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5138">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5138">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5139">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5140">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5140">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5141">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5142">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5142">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5143">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5143">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5144">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5144">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5145">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5145">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5146">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5147">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5148">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5149">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5149">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5150">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5150">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5151">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5151">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5152">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5152">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5154">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5154">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5155">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5155">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5156">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5156">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5157">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5157">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5158">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5158">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5159">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5160">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5160">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5161">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5162">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5162">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5163">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5164">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5166">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5167">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5167">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5168">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5168">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5169">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5169">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5171">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5171">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5172">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5172">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5174">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5174">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5175">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5175">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5176">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5176">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5177">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5177">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5178">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5178">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5180">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5180">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5182">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5182">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5184">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5184">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5186">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5186">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5187">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5187">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5188">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5188">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5189">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5189">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5190">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5190">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5191">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5195">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5195">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5196">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5196">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5197">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5197">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5198">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5198">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5199">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5199">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5200">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5200">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5203">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5203">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5204">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5204">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5207">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5207">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5208">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5208">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5209">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5210">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5210">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5211">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5212">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5212">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5213">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5213">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5214">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5214">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5215">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5216">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5216">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5217">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5219">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5220">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5220">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5236">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5236">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5237">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5238">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5238">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5240">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5240">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5241">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5241">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5242">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5242">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5243">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5243">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5244">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5244">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5245">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5245">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5246">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5246">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5247">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5247">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5248">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5248">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5249">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5249">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5250">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5251">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5251">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5254">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5254">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5255">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5255">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5256">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5257">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5257">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5320">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5320">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5321">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5321">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5322">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5323">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5323">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5324">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5325">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5325">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5326">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5326">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5327">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5327">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5328">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5329">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5329">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5330">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5331">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5332">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5332">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5333">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5353">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5353">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5354">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5356">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5356">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5358">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5358">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5360">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5363">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5364">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5380">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5380">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5381">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5382">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5383">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5384">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5385">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5387">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5388">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5388">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5390">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5390">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5391">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5391">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5392">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5392">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5393">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5393">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5394">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5394">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5395">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5396">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5396">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5397">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5398">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5399">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5399">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5400">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5401">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5402">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5402">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5437">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5437">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5438">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5439">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5440">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5440">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5441">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5442">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5442">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5443">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5444">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5444">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5447">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5447">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5448">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5465">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5465">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5466">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5467">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5468">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5468">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5469">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5470">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5470">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5471">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5472">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5473">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5474">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5475">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5476">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5492">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5492">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5493">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5493">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5494">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5494">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5495">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5495">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5496">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5496">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5497">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5497">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5499">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5500">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5500">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5501">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5502">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5502">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5503">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5503">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5504">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5504">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5505">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5506">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5506">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5507">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5508">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5508">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5509">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5509">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5510">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5510">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5511">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5511">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5512">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5512">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5535">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5535">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5536">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5537">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5538">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5538">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5539">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5540">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5540">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5541">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5542">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5543">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5545">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5545">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5546">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5546">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5553">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5553">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5554">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5555">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5555">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5557">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5557">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5558">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5558">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5559">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5559">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5560">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5560">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5561">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5561">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5562">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5563">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5564">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5564">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5565">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5565">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5566">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5567">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5567">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5568">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5570">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5570">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5571">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5573">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5573">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5613">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5613">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5614">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5615">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5615">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5616">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5617">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5617">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5618">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5618">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5619">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5619">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5620">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5620">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5621">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5622">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5622">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5623">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5623">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5624">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5625">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5628">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5628">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5629">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5629">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5656">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5656">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5657">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5658">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5659">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5659">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5661">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5661">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5662">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5662">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5663">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5663">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5664">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5664">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5665">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5665">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5666">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5666">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5668">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5671">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5671">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5672">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5672">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5678">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5678">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5684">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5684">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5685">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5685">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5688">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5688">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5689">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5690">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5691">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5692">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5693">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5696">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5696">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5698">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5698">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5699">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5699">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5700">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5700">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5701">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5702">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5702">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5703">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5704">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5705">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5706">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5706">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5707">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5707">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5708">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5708">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5710">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5710">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5725">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5725">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5726">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5726">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5727">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5728">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5728">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5730">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5730">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5731">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5732">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5732">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5733">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5734">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5735">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5735">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5736">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5753">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5753">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5754">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5755">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5755">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5756">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5756">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5757">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5757">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5758">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5758">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5760">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5760">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5761">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5761">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5762">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5762">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5763">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5763">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5764">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5764">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5765">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5766">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5766">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5768">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5769">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5769">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5770">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5770">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5771">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5772">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5772">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5805">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5805">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5806">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5807">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5807">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5809">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5809">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5810">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5810">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5811">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5811">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5812">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5812">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5813">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5813">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5814">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5814">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5815">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5816">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5817">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5819">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5819">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5820">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5820">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5821">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5845">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5845">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5846">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5846">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5847">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5848">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5848">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5849">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5850">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5850">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5851">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5852">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5852">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5853">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5854">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5854">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5855">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5855">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5856">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
