## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5874">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5874">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5875">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5875">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5876">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5877">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5877">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5878">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5879">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5879">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5880">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5881">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5881">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5883">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5884">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5884">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5885">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5885">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5895">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5895">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5896">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5897">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5898">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5899">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5900">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5902">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5903">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5903">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5905">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5905">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5906">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5907">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5909">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5910">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5910">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5911">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5911">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5912">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5913">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5913">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5951">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5951">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5952">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5953">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5954">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5955">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5956">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5958">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5959">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5959">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5960">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5961">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5961">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5962">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5962">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5963">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5963">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5964">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5964">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5965">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5965">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5966">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5966">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5967">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5967">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5968">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5968">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5969">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5970">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5970">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5971">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5972">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5972">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5973">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5973">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5974">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5974">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5975">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5976">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5976">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5981">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5981">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5982">wearde tafoege 세금 getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5982">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5983">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5983">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5985">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5985">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5986">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5986">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5987">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5987">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5988">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5988">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5989">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5989">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5990">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5990">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5991">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5991">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5992">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5992">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5993">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5993">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-5994">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5994">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-5995">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5995">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5996">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5996">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5997">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5997">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5998">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5998">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-5999">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-5999">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6000">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6000">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6001">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6001">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6002">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6002">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6003">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6003">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6005">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6008">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6008">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6009">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6009">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6010">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6011">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6011">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />

        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6019">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6019">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6020">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6020">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6021">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6021">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6022">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6022">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6023">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6023">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6024">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6024">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6025">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6025">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6026">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6027">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6027">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6028">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6029">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6029">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6030">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6030">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6031">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6032">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6033">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6033">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6034">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6035">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6035">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6036">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6036">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6037">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6037">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6038">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6038">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6039">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6039">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6107">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6107">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6108">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6108">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6109">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6109">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6110">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6110">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6111">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6111">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6112">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6112">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6113">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6114">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6114">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6115">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6116">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6116">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6117">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6117">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6118">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6118">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6119">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6119">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6120">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6120">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6121">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6121">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6122">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6123">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6124">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6125">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6126">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6126">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6127">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6127">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6128">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6129">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6129">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6138">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6138">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6139">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6140">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6140">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6141">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6142">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6142">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6143">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6144">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6144">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6145">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6146">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6147">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6147">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6148">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6148">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6149">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6149">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6151">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6151">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6156">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6156">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6157">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6157">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6158">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6158">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6159">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6159">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6160">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6160">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6161">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6161">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6163">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6164">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6164">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6166">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6166">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6167">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6167">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6168">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6168">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6169">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6169">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6170">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6170">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6171">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6171">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6173">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6176">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6176">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6177">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6177">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6178">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6178">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6179">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6179">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6187">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6187">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6189">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6189">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6190">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6191">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6191">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6192">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6192">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6193">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6193">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6194">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6194">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6195">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6196">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6197">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6199">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6199">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6200">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6200">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6201">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6202">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6203">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6203">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6204">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6213">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6213">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6215">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6215">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6217">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6217">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6218">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6218">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6219">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6219">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6220">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6220">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6221">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6221">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6222">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6222">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6223">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6224">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6224">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6225">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6226">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6227">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6227">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6228">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6228">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6229">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6229">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6232">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6232">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6233">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6233">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6235">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6235">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6236">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6237">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6238">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6238">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6240">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6240">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6241">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6241">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6242">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6242">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6243">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6243">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6244">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6244">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6245">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6245">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6247">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6250">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6250">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6251">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6251">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6260">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6260">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6261">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6261">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6263">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6263">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6264">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6264">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6267">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6267">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6268">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6269">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6269">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6271">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6271">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6272">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6273">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6273">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6276">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6276">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6277">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6277">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6278">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6289">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6289">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6290">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6291">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6291">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6292">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6292">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6293">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6293">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6294">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6294">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6295">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6295">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6297">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6300">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6300">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6301">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6301">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6302">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6302">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6303">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6304">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6304">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6305">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6306">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6306">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6307">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6307">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6315">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6315">pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6317">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6317">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6318">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6318">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6319">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6320">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6320">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6321">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6322">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6322">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6323">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6324">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6325">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6326">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6327">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6327">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6328">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6328">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6329">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6329">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6330">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6330">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6332">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6332">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6333">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6333">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6334">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6334">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6335">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6335">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6336">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6336">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6337">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6338">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6339">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6340">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6341">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6342">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6343">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6344">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6344">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6346">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6346">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6347">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6347">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6348">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6348">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6349">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6349">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6350">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6350">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6351">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6352">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6352">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6353">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6354">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6355">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6355">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6356">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6356">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6357">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6357">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6358">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6358">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6375">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6375">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6376">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6377">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6378">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6379">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6380">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6382">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6383">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6383">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6384">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6385">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6385">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6386">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6389">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6390">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6390">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6391">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6391">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6421">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6421">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6422">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6423">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6423">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6424">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6425">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6425">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6426">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6427">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6427">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6428">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6429">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6430">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6430">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6431">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6431">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6441">identification number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6451">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6451">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6452">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6453">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6454">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6454">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6455">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6456">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6456">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6457">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6457">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6458">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6458">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6459">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6459">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6460">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6460">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6461">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6461">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6462">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6463">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6464">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6465">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6466">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6466">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6467">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6467">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6473">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6473">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6479">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6479">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6483">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6483">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6484">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6485">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6486">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6486">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6488">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6488">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6489">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6489">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6490">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6490">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6491">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6492">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6494">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6495">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6495">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6496">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6520">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6520">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6521">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6522">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6522">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6523">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6523">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6524">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6524">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6525">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6525">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6526">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6526">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6527">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6527">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6528">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6528">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6529">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6530">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6530">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6532">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6533">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6533">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6534">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6534">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6535">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6535">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6536">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6536">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6561">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6561">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6562">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6562">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6563">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6563">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6564">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6564">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6565">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6565">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6566">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6566">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6567">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6567">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6568">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6568">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6569">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6570">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6570">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6571">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6573">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6573">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6574">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6574">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6586">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6586">driver's licence number</span></span>
