## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6590">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6590">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6591">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6591">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6592">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6592">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6593">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6593">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6594">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6594">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6595">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6595">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6597">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6598">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6598">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6600">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6600">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6601">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6601">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6602">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6602">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6603">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6603">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6604">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6604">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6605">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6605">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6606">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6606">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6607">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6607">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6608">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6608">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6609">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6609">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6610">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6611">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6611">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6662">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6662">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6663">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6664">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6665">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6665">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6667">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6667">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6668">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6669">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6672">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6672">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6673">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6688">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6688">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6689">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6690">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6691">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6692">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6693">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6694">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6696">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6696">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6698">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6698">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6699">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6699">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6700">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6700">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6701">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6701">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6702">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6702">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6703">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6703">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6704">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6705">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6705">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6706">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6707">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6708">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6708">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6709">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6709">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6726">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6726">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6727">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6727">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6728">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6728">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6729">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6729">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6730">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6730">information governance</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6733">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6733">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6735">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6736">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6736">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6737">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6737">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6738">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6738">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6740">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6741">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6742">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6744">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6744">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6745">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6745">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6762">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6762">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6763">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6764">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6764">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6766">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6766">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6767">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6768">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6770">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6771">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6771">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6772">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6772">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6779">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6779">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6781">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6781">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6782">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6783">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6783">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6784">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6784">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6785">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6785">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6786">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6786">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6787">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6788">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6791">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6791">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6792">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6792">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6793">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6794">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6795">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6795">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6796">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6807">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6807">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6808">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6808">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6809">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6810">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6810">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6811">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6812">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6812">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6813">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6813">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6814">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6814">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6815">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6816">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6816">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6817">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6819">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6819">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6820">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6820">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6836">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6836">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6837">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6837">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6840">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6840">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6841">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6841">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6843">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6844">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6844">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6845">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6845">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6846">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6846">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6847">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6847">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6848">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6848">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6849">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6849">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6850">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6853">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6854">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6854">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6855">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6855">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6856">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6857">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6857">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6904">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6904">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6905">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6906">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6907">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6907">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6908">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6909">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6909">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6910">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6911">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6913">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6914">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6914">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6915">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6934">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6934">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6935">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6936">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6937">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6937">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6938">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6939">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6939">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6941">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6944">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6945">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6961">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6961">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6962">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6962">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6963">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6963">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6964">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6964">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6965">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6965">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6966">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6966">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6968">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6969">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6969">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6970">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6971">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6971">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6972">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6972">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6973">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6973">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6974">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6974">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6975">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6975">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6976">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6977">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-6978">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6979">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6980">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6980">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6981">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6981">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-6982">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-6983">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-6983">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7011">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7011">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7012">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7013">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7014">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7014">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7016">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7016">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7017">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7017">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7018">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7018">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7019">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7019">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7020">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7021">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7021">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7022">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7023">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7024">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7024">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7025">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7025">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7038">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7038">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7039">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7039">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7040">potek veljavnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7040">potek veljavnosti</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7043">potni 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7043">potni list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7044">številke potnih listov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7044">številke potnih listov</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7045">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7045">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7046">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7047">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7048">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7049">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7050">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7052">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7053">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7053">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7054">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7055">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7055">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7056">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7056">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7057">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7057">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7058">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7059">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7059">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7060">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7062">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7062">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7063">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7063">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7064">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7064">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7065">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7065">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7089">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7089">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7090">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7091">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7091">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7092">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7093">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7093">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7094">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7094">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7095">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7095">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7096">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7096">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7097">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7097">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7098">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7098">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7099">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7100">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7100">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7101">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7102">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7102">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7103">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7103">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7104">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7104">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7105">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7105">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7106">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7106">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7107">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7107">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7111">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7111">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7112">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7113">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7113">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7114">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7115">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7115">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7116">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7116">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7117">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7117">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7118">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7118">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7119">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7119">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7120">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7120">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7121">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7121">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7122">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7123">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7124">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7125">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7126">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7126">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7127">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7127">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7128">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7129">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7130">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7130">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7131">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7132">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7132">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7135">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7135">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7136">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7136">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7137">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7137">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7139">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7139">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7140">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7141">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7142">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7142">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7143">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7144">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7144">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7145">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7145">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7146">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7146">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7147">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7148">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7148">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7149">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7150">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7150">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7151">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7151">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7152">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7152">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7189">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7189">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7190">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7190">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7191">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7191">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7192">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7192">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7193">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7193">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7194">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7194">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7196">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7197">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7197">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7199">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7199">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7200">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7200">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7201">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7201">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7202">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7202">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7203">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7204">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7205">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7206">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7207">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7207">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7208">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7208">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7209">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7210">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7210">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7234">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7234">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7235">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7236">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7237">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7237">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7239">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7239">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7240">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7240">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7241">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7241">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7242">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7242">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7243">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7244">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7244">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7247">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7247">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7248">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7248">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7274">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7274">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7275">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7275">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7276">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7277">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7277">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7278">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7279">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7279">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7280">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7280">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7281">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7281">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7282">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7282">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7283">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7283">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7284">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7284">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7285">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7286">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7287">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7288">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7289">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7289">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7290">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7291">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7291">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7292">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7292">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7293">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7293">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7294">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7294">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7295">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7295">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7296">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7296">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7297">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7297">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7298">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7298">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7300">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7301">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7301">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7302">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7303">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7303">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7304">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7304">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7305">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7305">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7306">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7306">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7307">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7307">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7308">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7309">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7309">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7310">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7310">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7311">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7311">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7312">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7312">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7313">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7313">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7314">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7314">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7315">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7315">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7316">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7316">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7317">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7317">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7318">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7318">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7319">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7319">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7320">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7321">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7321">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7322">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7323">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7323">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7324">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7325">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7325">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7326">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7326">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7327">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7328">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7329">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7329">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7330">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7330">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7331">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7331">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7332">cif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7332">cif</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7333">cifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7333">cifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7334">cifnúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7334">cifnúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7335">número de contribuyente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7335">número de contribuyente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7336">número de identificación 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7336">número de identificación fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7337">número de impuesto corporativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7337">número de impuesto corporativo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7338">spanishcifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7338">spanishcifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7339">spanishcifid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7339">spanishcifid</span></span>
