## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7360">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7360">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7361">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7362">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7362">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7363">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7363">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7364">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7364">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7365">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7365">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7366">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7366">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7367">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7367">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7368">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7368">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7369">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7369">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7370">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7370">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7371">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7372">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7373">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7374">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7375">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7375">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7376">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7376">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7377">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7377">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7378">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7378">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7379">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7381">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7381">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7382">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7382">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7383">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7383">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7384">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7384">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7386">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7386">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7387">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7387">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7388">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7388">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7389">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7389">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7390">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7390">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7391">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7391">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7392">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7392">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7394">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7394">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7395">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7395">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7396">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7396">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7397">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7397">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7398">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7398">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7399">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7399">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7400">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7400">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7401">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7401">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7402">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7402">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7403">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7403">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7404">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7404">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7405">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7405">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7406">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7406">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7407">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7407">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7408">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7409">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7409">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7411">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7411">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7412">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7412">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7413">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7414">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7414">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7415">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7416">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7416">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7419">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7419">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7420">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7420">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7421">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7421">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7423">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7423">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7424">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7424">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7425">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7425">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7426">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7426">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7427">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7427">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7428">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7428">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7429">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7429">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7430">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7430">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7431">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7431">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7432">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7432">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7433">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7433">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7434">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7434">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7435">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7435">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7436">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7436">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7437">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7438">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7438">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7439">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7440">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7440">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7441">두 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7441">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7442">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7442">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7443">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7443">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7444">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7444">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7445">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7446">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7447">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7448">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7449">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7449">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7450">From 키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7450">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7451">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7452">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7453">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7453">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7454">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7454">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7473">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7473">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7474">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7474">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7475">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7476">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7476">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7478">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7478">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7479">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7480">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7482">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7483">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7483">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7484">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7484">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7485">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7485">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7486">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7486">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7517">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7517">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7518">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7519">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7520">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7520">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7521">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7522">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7522">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7523">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7523">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7524">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7524">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7525">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7525">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7526">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7526">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7527">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7527">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7528">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7529">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7529">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7530">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7531">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7531">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7532">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7532">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7533">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7534">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7535">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7535">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7536">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7536">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7537">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7537">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7538">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7538">personal id number</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7551">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7551">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7552">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7552">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7553">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7553">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7554">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7554">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7555">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7555">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7556">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7556">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7557">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7557">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7558">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7559">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7559">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7560">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7561">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7561">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7562">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7562">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7563">더하기 기호 또는 빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7563">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7564">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7564">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7565">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7565">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7566">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7566">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7567">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7568">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7569">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7572">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7572">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7573">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7575">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7575">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7601">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7601">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7602">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7603">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7603">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7604">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7605">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7605">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7606">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7606">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7607">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7607">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7608">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7608">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7609">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7609">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7610">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7610">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7611">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7612">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7613">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7614">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7615">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7615">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7616">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7616">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7648">\# BIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7648">\# BIC</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7650">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7650">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7651">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7651">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7652">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7652">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7653">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7653">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7654">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7654">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7655">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7655">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7656">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7656">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7657">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7658">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7658">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7659">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7660">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7660">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7661">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7661">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7662">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7662">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7663">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7664">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7664">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7665">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7665">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7666">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7666">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7667">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7667">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7668">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7669">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7672">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7672">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7673">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7673">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7675">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7675">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7695">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7696">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7696">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7697">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7698">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7698">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7700">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7700">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7701">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7701">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7702">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7702">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7703">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7703">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7704">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7705">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7706">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7707">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7707">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7708">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7708">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7709">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7709">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7710">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7712">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7712">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7713">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7713">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7719">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7719">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7720">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7720">身分證字號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7722">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7722">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7723">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7723">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7724">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7724">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7725">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7725">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7726">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7726">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7727">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7727">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7728">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7728">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7729">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7729">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7730">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7730">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7731">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7731">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7732">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7732">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7733">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7733">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7734">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7734">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7735">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7735">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7736">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7736">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7737">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7737">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7738">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7738">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7739">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7739">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7740">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7741">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7742">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7744">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7744">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7745">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7745">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7746">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7746">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7747">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7747">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7748">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7748">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7749">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7749">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7750">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7750">Passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7754">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7754">中華民國護照</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7756">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7756">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7757">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7758">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7758">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7760">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7760">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7761">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7761">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7762">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7763">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7764">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7765">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7766">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7766">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7767">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7767">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7768">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7768">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7773">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7773">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7774">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7774">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7775">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7775">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7781">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7781">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7782">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7782">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7783">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7784">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7784">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7785">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7786">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7786">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7787">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7787">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7788">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7788">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7789">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7790">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7793">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7793">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7794">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7794">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7796">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7796">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7801">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7801">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7802">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7802">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7803">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7803">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7804">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7804">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7805">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7805">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7806">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7807">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7807">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7809">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7809">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7810">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7811">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7814">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7814">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7815">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7815">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7816">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7817">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7817">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7818">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7818">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7819">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7819">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7820">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7820">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7821">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7821">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7823">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7823">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7824">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7824">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7825">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7825">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7826">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7826">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7827">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7828">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7829">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7830">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7831">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7831">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7832">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7832">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7833">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7833">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7834">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7834">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7835">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7835">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7836">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7837">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7838">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7839">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7839">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7840">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7840">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7841">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7841">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7842">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7860">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7860">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7861">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7861">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7862">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7863">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7863">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7864">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7865">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7865">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7866">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7867">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7870">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7870">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7871">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7871">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7872">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7872">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7878">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7878">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7879">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7879">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7880">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7881">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7881">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7883">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7883">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7884">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7884">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7885">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7885">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7886">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7886">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7887">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7887">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7888">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7888">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7889">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7890">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7890">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7891">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7892">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7892">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7893">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7893">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7894">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7894">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7895">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7895">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7896">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7897">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7898">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7898">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7916">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7916">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7917">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7917">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7918">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7918">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7919">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7920">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7920">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7921">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7922">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7922">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7923">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7923">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7924">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7924">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7925">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7925">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7926">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7926">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7927">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7927">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7928">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7928">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7929">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7929">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7930">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7931">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7932">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7933">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7934">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7935">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7935">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7936">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7937">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7938">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7939">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7940">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7940">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7941">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7941">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7942">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7943">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7943">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7944">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7944">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7945">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7945">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7946">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7946">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7947">national insurance number</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7966">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7966">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7967">고유 Taxpayer 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7967">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7968">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7968">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7969">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7969">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7970">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7970">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7971">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7971">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7972">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7972">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7973">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7973">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7974">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7975">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7975">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7976">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7977">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7977">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7978">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7979">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="243ae-7980">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="243ae-7981">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7982">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7982">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="243ae-7983">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7983">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="243ae-7988">tax id</span></span>
